name: Rise of Insanity
description: In Rise of Insanity, as a doctor of psychology you will explore the darkest recesses of the human mind. Overcome your fear to find the truth behind the tragedy that has befallen your family.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: PC - Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600, VR - i5- 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: PC - GTX 560 Ti, VR - GTX 970 Storage: 10 GB available space
